#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int ar[15]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384};

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;
    int r;
    int no=n;
    int cnt=0;
    while(no!=0)
    {
    int i;
    for(i=0;ar[i]<=no;i++);
    int index=i-1;
    r=n%ar[index];
    no=r;
    cnt++;
    }
    cout<<cnt;
    return 0;
}
